ygData.subject: Re: Grouping issues
ygData.msgSnippet: Hrm.. still prefer the autosplit of coins. I know ppl tell me that you end up with more copper weighing you down that way. But if you don t do that, it becomes
ygData.messageBody:
Hrm.. still prefer the autosplit of coins. I know
ppl tell me that you end up with more copper weighing
you down that way. But if you don't do that, it
becomes a matter of one person being honest enough or not
forgetful enough to keep count after every
loot.<br><br>Hrm... random alpha loot for nicer items? Ideally nice.
I can see it's benefits at higher levels for nicer
items. I'm beginning to see that every method has its
flaws though. My concern is for every day loot though.
<br><br>My level 9 spells are over 5 plat (I believe-- was
tired when I last checked). Every rusty weapon I loot
is an extra gold and an extra chance at
Blacksmithing early.<br><br>Oh well... I guess if I'm really
that concerned about money-- I'll just go and kill as
many bees as I can. I could probably make quite a bit
of plat each hour I do that. I just hate to kill in
newbie areas just b/c I need plat. They need the exp.
<br><br>I'm not high enough to kill wisps yet, else I'd do
that for the exp and lightstone's for plats.
Sigh/grin. Now that I know about that, I won't sell my light
stones to shop keepers and gls to players for 5 plat. =)
Seen the posts, figured that's what would be
suggested. <br><br>shooman out
